reviewText:
I'm a big fan of Norris Chumley.  Also, Susan Sarandon is great on here, as well.

If you are looking to lose weight, and nothing has worked for you, this is something you should look at.  However, if you do not believe in God, you may have a problem with it.  It is based on letting God help you control your weight.  it has certainly worked for Norris!  For many, many years.
